attributes.action: Stop uber using taxi drivers from other cities/town to come and work in Cardiff.
attributes.background: Uber taxi are flooding the city of Cardiff with taxi drivers from other cities and towns outside of Cardiff. These other drivers have not done the knowledge test of Cardiff City, or the btec course on health and safety. It's going to put the public at risk.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions which call on the Government to stop individual companies operating. That's not something that the Government or Parliament can do.

If you would like the Government to change the way in which private hire firms are regulated, to address the problems you are concerned about, you could start a petition about that.
